properties.title: Textual IRC Client Extras
properties.certificate: 3rd Party Mac Developer Installer: BestTechie Holdings, Inc.

locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1187\cocoasubrtf340 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;\f1\froman\fcharset0 TimesNewRomanPSMT;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 This installation provides add-ons for the Textual IRC Client that are no longer packaged by default because of difficulties with the Mac App Store sandbox environment. \ \ They require installation into an Apple-defined folder that the actual Textual application cannot write to.\ \ ----------------------------------------------------\ \ Commands available after installation:\ \ \'95 \f1\b \f0\b0 apps \'97 List all running applications.\ \'95 \f1\b \f0\b0 music \'97 iTunes library size information.\ \'95 \f1\b \f0\b0 np \'97 Now playing information for iTunes.\ \'95 \f1\b \f0\b0 page \'97 Information about active page in Safari.\ \'95 \f1\b \f0\b0 spotify \'97 Now playing information for Spotify. }
